alert.note: Alert for Washington (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 02 at 2:45PM CST until January 03 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST TUESDAY... ...ICE STORM WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation. Additional snow accumulations of up to around one inch and ice accumulations of a tenth of an inch or less. * WHERE...In Iowa, Harrison County. In Nebraska, Washington County. * WHEN...Until 6 PM CST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
